usage:
Syntax: script <file>
path can be relative
Examples of use: script data\zelda.cmd
                 script c:\luigi.cmd
Specify the Json file name where the collected information will be saved, after calling the StopProfiler command.
The interval is specified in milliseconds. Possible values are 2-50. The default is 5.

GetChannelName.help: Get the human-readable name of a debug channel

qd.help: Get history of debug messages. Clear queue in progress.
qd.output: Array of Pair<Debug::Channel, string>: [ 4, "Message1", 7, "Message2" ] or empty Array []

GetPerformanceCounter.help: Get the value of the performance counter

ResetPerformanceCounter.help: Reset the value of the performance counter
